Show Web Site Failed

Could not launch browser activity

The following exception was thrown on the attempt to start activity with the ACTION_VIEW intent. This is an issue with your device.

Exception:

%1$s

Failed To Send WAKE-ON-LAN Packet

The following exception was thrown on the attempt to send a WOL packet to your host. This could be an error with your target host setup, or it could be an issue with your network connection.

If the host has worked before it is probably a network issue. Remember that WOL packets are broadcast, and usually this means you must be on the same local area network via WiFi as the host you are trying to wake up.

Look at the exception message for clues about the failure reason.

Exception:

%1$s

Application Error

Cannot show Host awoke screen without providing a valid host key.

Valid host keys are 0 up to %1$d, but %2$d was provided.

Normally this screen would show that a particular host woke up after it after receiving a Wake On Lan magic packet.

• Is WiFi enabled?
  • Are you on the same network by WiFi that the host you need to wake up is on?
